name: Natixis Investissement Partners
overview: Natixis Investissement Partners is a private equity firm specializing in financing acquisitions and expansion capital for internal and external growth of companies and shareholding evolution transactions by buying back existing shares from family shareholders and institutional actors, or participating in OBO or Leveraged Buy Out. It prefers to invest in small and medium sized companies. The firm prefers to invest in service industries, food processing, software, and telecommunications sectors. It seeks to invest in companies based in France. The firm typically invests in four to five major transactions per year for annual investments amounting between $86.04 million to $143.41 million for a minority stake of 15 percent to 40 percent in its portfolio companies. It was founded in 1997 and is based in Paris, France. Natixis Investissement Partners operates as a subsidiary of NATIXIS group.
